content: For release on delivery   10:10 a.m. EDT (4:10 p.m. local time)   September 26, 2013           Yield-Oriented Investors and the Monetary Transmission Mechanism      Remarks by    Jeremy C. Stein    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Banking, Liquidity and Monetary Policy”    a Symposium Sponsored by the Center for Financial Studies   in Honor of Raghuram Rajan    Frankfurt, Germany          September 26, 2013
